description.en: MiniUSDC is a deflationary coin that will grow in scarcity over time and has a real-world utility. It is the native token of Cryptogram and gives 10% rewards to holders in USDC. Holders of MiniUSDC also get a 60% revenue share distributed from a pool every quarter. Cryptogram is a unique crypto based social-media platform that allows users to chat anonymously, follow/track top trader wallets & trends. This is done without compromising your identity or security. Top crypto investors & traders can gain followers, buy unique & tradeable usernames & collect subscription fees like other social media platforms. Only platform that gives you direct access to successful top traders, while keeping your anonymity intact!
